description:
A mysterious girl who transferred to http://anidb.net/ch19205 [Muneakira]`s class.
On their first meeting, she proposed to Muneakira: "Make me... Muneakira-sama`s slave." After that, she tries to seduce Muneakira by every means and her extremely dangerous behaviour stands out.
She seems to know Muneakira very well but Muneakira is disturbed for not remembering anything about her.
name: Yagyuu Gisen
